parameters.name: Cluster
parameters.query:
where type in~ ("Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters")
//| extend addonprofiles =  parse_json(properties.addonProfiles
| extend loganalytics = parse_json(properties.addonProfiles.omsagent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID) 
| project _ResourceID= id, label = name

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type in~ ("Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters")
| extend loganalytics = parse_json(properties.addonProfiles.omsagent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID) 
| where id contains "{Cluster}"
| project _ResourceId = tostring(loganalytics), label = split(loganalytics, "/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/")[1]

parameters.name: ApplicationGateway
parameters.label: Application Gateway
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
| distinct  _ResourceId, Resource
| project _ResourceId, label = Resource

content.title: Key Metrics in the Last 30 Minutes

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess" and httpStatus_d > 399
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by userAgent_s
| sort by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Errors by user agent

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess" 
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by userAgent_s
| sort by AggregatedValue desc
content.title: Top User-agents

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
		| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by requestUri_s
content.title: Top URIs

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
		| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess" and httpStatus_d > 499
| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by requestUri_s
content.title: Server Failures by URI

content.json:
#### Application gateway total time vs Backend last byte response time

*Application gateway total time* is the interval from the time when Application Gateway receives the first byte of the HTTP request to the time when the last response byte has been sent to the client. This equals the *Backend last byte response time* + the processing time taken by Application Gateway + *Client rtt* (only when the window size of the client TCP request is small relative to the response). Compare the 2 metrics to determine whether the issue is with the Application Gateway or the backend.
If the *Application gateway total time* has a spike but the Backend last byte response time is stable, then it can either be a sign of performance bottleneck at the Application Gateway or a bottleneck in the network between the client and Application Gateway (only when the window size of the client TCP request is small relative to the response).

content.title: App Gateway Total Time per Listener

labelSettings.label: Backend Last Byte Response Time Timeline

items.name: App Gateway Total Time per Listener

labelSettings.label: Backend Last Byte Response Time Timeline

content.json:
#### Backend connect time vs Backend first byte response time vs Backend last byte response time

**Backend connect time** is the time spent establishing a connection with the backend application. This includes the network latency as well as the time taken by the backend server’s TCP stack to establish new connections. In case of TLS, it also includes the time spent on handshake.

**Backend first byte response time** is the time interval between start of establishing a connection to backend server and receiving the first byte of the response header.This approximates the sum of *Backend connect time*, time taken by the request to reach the backend from Application Gateway, time taken by backend application to respond (the time the server took to generate content, potentially fetch database queries), and the time taken by first byte of the response to reach the Application Gateway from the backend.

**Backend last byte response time** is the time interval between start of establishing a connection to backend server and receiving the last byte of the response body. This approximates the sum of *Backend first byte response time* and data transfer time (this number may vary greatly depending on the size of objects requested and the latency of the server network).

If there’s a spike in Backend first byte response time trend but the Backend connect time trend is stable, then it can be inferred that the Application gateway to backend latency and the time taken to establish the connection is stable, and the spike is caused due to an increase in the response time of backend application. On the other hand, if the spike in Backend first byte response time is associated with a corresponding spike in Backend connect time, then it can be deduced that either the network between Application Gateway and backend server or the backend server TCP stack has saturated.If you notice a spike in Backend last byte response time but the Backend first byte response time is stable, then it can be deduced that the spike is because of a larger file being requested.

content.title: Backend First Byte Response Time Average per Pod

content.json:
### Capacity Units
The capacity units consumed by your Application Gateway is determined by 3 dimensions: *compute unit*, *current connections*, and *throughput*. Each capacity unit is composed of at most: 1 *compute unit*, or 2500 *current connections*, or 2.22-Mbps *throughput*. Check the value of the 3 metrics below to infer variation in which of the three dimensions led to the changes in *Capacity Units*

### Compute Units
*Compute unit* is a measure of processor capacity consumed. Factors affecting compute unit are TLS connections/sec, URL Rewrite computations, and WAF rule processing.

items.name: metric - 18 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.json:
### Current connections
*Current connections* is a measure of established TCP connections to the application gateway.

### Throughput
*Throughput* is average Megabits/sec processed by the Application Gateway.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.query:
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where ClusterId has "{Cluster}"
| distinct Namespace

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where ClusterId contains "{Cluster}"
| where Namespace == "{Namespace}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'cpuUsageNanoCores'
    | where InstanceName contains "{Cluster}"
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, CounterValue=(CounterValue / 1000000)
content.title: CPU Usage Per Pod ( in millicores )

items.name: CPU Usage Per Pod ( in millicores )

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where ClusterId contains "{Cluster}"
| where Namespace == "{Namespace}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryRssBytes'    
    | where InstanceName contains '{Cluster}'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, CounterValue=(CounterValue)
content.title: RSS Memory Usage Per Pod

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where ClusterId contains "{Cluster}"
| where Namespace has "{Namespace}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryWorkingSetBytes'    
    | where InstanceName contains "{Cluster}"
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, CounterValue=(CounterValue)
content.title: Memory Working Set by Pod

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where ClusterId contains "{Cluster}"
| where Namespace == "{Namespace}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'cpuLimitNanoCores'
    | where InstanceName contains '{Cluster}'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project ContainerName, CpuLimit=CounterValue
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'cpuUsageNanoCores'
        | where InstanceName contains "{Cluster}"
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
        | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CpuUsage=CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
) on ContainerName
| order by Name asc
| project Name,  CPUPercentage=(CpuUsage/CpuLimit*100), CpuLimit=(CpuLimit / 1000000),CpuUsage=round(CpuUsage / 1000000),ContainerName
content.title: CPU Utlization - Current

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where ClusterId has "{Cluster}"
| where Namespace == "{Namespace}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryLimitBytes'
    | where InstanceName contains '{Cluster}'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project ContainerName, MemLimit=CounterValue
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'memoryRssBytes'
        | where InstanceName contains '{Cluster}'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
        | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemUsage=CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemPercentage=(MemUsage / MemLimit) * 100, MemUsage, MemLimit
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project  Name, MemPercentage, MemUsage, MemLimit
content.title: Percentage Memory(RSS) Usage Percentage

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where ClusterId has "{Cluster}"
| where Namespace == "{Namespace}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryLimitBytes'
    | where InstanceName contains '{Cluster}'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project ContainerName, MemLimit=CounterValue
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'memoryWorkingSetBytes'
        | where InstanceName contains '{Cluster}'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
        | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemUsage=CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemPercentage=(MemUsage / MemLimit) * 100, MemUsage, MemLimit
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project  Name, MemPercentage, MemUsage, MemLimit
content.title: Percentage Memory(Working Set) Usage Percentage

parameters.name: Pod
parameters.query:
KubePodInventory 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where ContainerStatus == "running"
| distinct ContainerID

content.query:
ContainerLog 
| where ContainerID == "{Pod}"
| project TimeGenerated, LogEntry
content.title: Logs

content.query:
KubePodInventory | where ClusterId contains '{Cluster}' 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 2min), Namespace
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Namespace
| summarize namespaceCount = count()
| project namespaceCount,now()
content.title: Namespaces

content.query:
KubePodInventory 
// | where ClusterId == '$clusterid'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 2min), PodUid, Namespace
, ControllerKind
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by PodUid, nsc = strcat(Namespace
,"/", ControllerKind)
| summarize controllerCountByNamespace = count() by nsc
| sort by controllerCountByNamespace desc
| project controllerCountByNamespace, nsc, now()
content.title: Controllers per Namespace

metrics.metric: Container Insights-Node Disk IO-Microsoft.IOPS in progress

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| extend tags=todynamic(Tags) 
| where Name =="used_percent"
//| where tags["container.azm.ms/clusterId"] == '$clusterid'
| extend hostName=tags.hostName
| extend device=tags.device
| extend disk=strcat(device, "/" , hostName) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by disk
// | where Val > 80.0
| sort by Val desc
| project Val, disk
content.title: % Used Disk of Nodes
